Pre-Game Insights: India look to go 9-0 in the World Cup as they take on Netherlands
India have been absolutely dominant during their 8-0 run at this World Cup
India face the least-fancied team of the tournament, Netherlands
India head coach Rahul Dravid's press conference indicated no 'tactical' changes but possible game time for Prasidh Krishna and R Ashwin
Virat Kohli is chasing a century that will put him at 50 ODI tons
Netherlands have been in India longer than any other visiting side this World Cup
Netherlands wouldn't want to finish rock-bottom on the points table
Shubman Gill was the unanimous choice among fans and experts as the one player most likely to succeed at the World Cup
Bas de Leede has the most wickets for Netherlands at this World Cup (14) but also the worst economy (7.10) among his team's quicks
India vs Netherlands Weather Report: The temperature of Bengaluru City on Sunday, November 12 will be 27° Celcius during the day and 16° Celcius at night
The chances of rain are 2% during the day and 3% at night
The India vs Netherlands Pitch Report suggests that M. Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru is a high-scoring ground
The highest-ever team total at the stadium is 401/6 by New Zealand
India vs Netherlands, November 12, 14:00 IST at M. Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru
India have had a six-day break since their last game against South Africa
Max O'Dowd is a quality player going through a wretched run of form in this World Cup
Scott Edwards is a good player of spin bowling, averaging 62.77 over 820 balls in ODI cricket
Virat Kohli averages only 25.33 from six ODIs played in Bengaluru
Bas de Leede has 18 wickets in the death overs (41-50) since the start of 2022
Bengaluru has the best runs-per-wicket ratio - 36.45 - at this World Cup
Rahul Dravid hints that there won't be any tinkering with personnel with just a week to go in the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The sky will be cloudy during the day but clear at night
The humidity will be 63% during the day and rise to 84% at night
The average 1st innings total in ODIs at M. Chinnaswamy Stadium is 237 while the average 2nd innings total is 216
The stadium has witnessed 41 ODIs so far
The team batting first won 15 games while the team batting second won 22 matches
Australia scored 367 against Pakistan here while New Zealand thumped 401
The Chinnaswamy Stadium has played true to its 'bat second' character with chasing teams having won three of the four games here
